text: The Diocese of Lentini (Latin: Dioecesis Leontina) was a Roman Catholic diocese located in the town of Lentini in the Province of Syracuse in the southeast of Sicily. Erected in 259, it was suppressed in 790."Diocese of Lentini" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 25, 2016"Titular Episcopal See of Lentini" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved August 25, 2016 It was restored as a Titular Episcopal See in 1968. ==See also== *Catholic Church in Italy ==References== Lentini Category:Former Roman Catholic dioceses in Italy
title: Roman Catholic Diocese of Lentini
